title: LeGarrette Blount
summary: LeGarrette Montez Blount (/ˈlʌɡærɛt ˈblʌnt/;[1] born December 5, 1986) is a former American football running back who played in the National Football League (NFL) for nine seasons. He played college football at Oregon after transferring from East Mississippi Community College. Not selected in the 2010 NFL Draft, he began his NFL career as an undrafted free agent.
